attributes.action: Reject the planned state funeral for Margaret Thatcher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposal should be rejected as it is the biggest insult to every working class person in Great Britain.How can this goverment expect this countries working class people to line the streets to pay their respects to a woman who ripped the industrial backbone out of this country,destroyed communities and gave birth to the I'm alright screw the rest of you society.So lets put the £3,000,000 to charity and let the tories pay for her funeral not us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
